TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed OperationFlow extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the type of transmission an endpoint of the XML Web service can support.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Although request-response or solicit-response operations are logically correlated in the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document, the concrete correlation information will be specified by a binding. For example, the request and response messages can be exchanged as part of one or two actual HTTP transmissions.
## Examples The following sample demonstrates the use of the `OperationFlow` enumeration.
[!code-cpp[OperationFlow_Enum#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.web.services.de_29_1.cpp)] [!code-cs[OperationFlow_Enum#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.web.services.de_29_1.cs)] [!code-vb[OperationFlow_Enum#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.web.services.de_29_1.vb)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFlow None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the endpoint of the XML Web service receives no transmissions.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFlow Notification = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the endpoint of the XML Web service sends a message.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFlow OneWay = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the endpoint of the XML Web service receives a message.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFlow RequestResponse = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the endpoint of the XML Web service receives a message, then sends a correlated message.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFlow SolicitResponse = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the endpoint of the XML Web service sends a message, then receives a correlated message.
